Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.Cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ObserverImplementation.Observable<OBS_Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<ClientModel,Message>, Runnable
public class Cli extends View implements Runnable
This class handles input and output in cli version
Author:
Riccardo Figini
